titles.title: Veterans' Vocational Training Continuation Act of 1988
A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the period for the temporary program of vocational training for certain veterans' pension recipients.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from VA, OMB.

bill.summary: 5/27/1988--Introduced. Veterans' Vocational Training Continuation Act of 1988 - Extends for one year (from January 31, 1989, to January 31, 1990) the temporary program of vocational training and health-care eligibility for certain new veterans' pension recipients.
